description: Standard Electronic Visa for countries with digital processing (SE Asia, etc.).

documents.title: Passport Bio Page
documents.description: Clear color scan of the passport information page.

documents.title: Digital Photo
documents.description: Recent photograph, white background, specific pixel dimensions (e.g., 400x600px).

documents.title: Return Flight Ticket
documents.description: Confirmed return or onward journey ticket.

documents.title: Hotel Booking
documents.description: Proof of accommodation for the entire stay.

steps_flow.title: Register
steps_flow.description: Create account on the official E-Visa portal.

steps_flow.title: Fill Details
steps_flow.description: Enter passport and travel details accurately.

steps_flow.title: Upload & Pay
steps_flow.description: Upload docs and pay fee online.

steps_flow.title: Download Visa
steps_flow.description: Receive Electronic Travel Authorization (ETA) or E-Visa via email.
